channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Login With OTP Over SMS, Email, WhatsApp and Google Authenticator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Login With OTP Over SMS, Email, WhatsApp and Google Authenticator

item.title: CVE-2022-1994|2024-08-03T00:24:43.944Z -- unknown -- login%20with%20otp%20over%20sms%2C%20email%2C%20whatsapp%20and%20google%20authenticator
item.description: The Login With OTP Over SMS, Email, WhatsApp and Google Authenticator WordPress plugin before 1.0.8 does not escape its settings, allowing high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html is disallowed
